argument.name: Action_List
argument.description: If you call the method with no arguments, then the method returns a list of actions supported by the OLE object.

argument.name: ole_action_verb
argument.description: The name of a method supported by the OLE object.

page.description: Perform an OLE action, get list of actions if no action provided.
page.discussion: The .OLE_ACTION() method is available for OLE objects (both field objects, and static OLE objects on forms). Limitations: Desktop applications only.
